lenders.name: Charlie Fyffe - CEO
lenders.occupational_info:
Disciplined Respected Entrepreneurs is a community based youth organization created to bring together the best and brightest African-American college students to learn entrepreneurhsip. 

D.R.E. Jr. Leaders serve as mentors in empowering underprivileged youth to reach their dreams through education, empowerment, and financial literacy. 

We are based in California.

For every $25 donated to D.R.E., a copy of "Go To Your Destiny" by Calvin & Alvin Harrison will be given to a child in the inner city. 

Contact US
charles.fyffe@gmail.com

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help.
simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 21 year old college student who knows there is more out there in the world for me to do and accomplish, I work hard and want to reach out to others.

lenders.name: Tommy
lenders.loan_because: This is a nice way to support people

lenders.name: Johan Möller
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people :-)

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it's something I can do to make the world a better place for someone. Anything I can do to give others more freedom and choice is worth while.
lenders.occupational_info: I do what I can to help people. I judge the good I do on the outcome, such as cheating death for someone so they can have another 10 years or just another day. They have a chance to use that day either to rewrite their destiny or even just to say goodbye to loved ones.

lenders.name: Jeroen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of (good-)will.
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies about people in Holland, and all across the globe.

lenders.loan_because: I believe that people can organise and take care of themselves if just given the time and opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an ecommerce consultant and a wine merchant

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: Because I can help.

lenders.name: Mattress Crafters
lenders.loan_because: We built our own small business from humble beginnings, and this year have opened a new store. We want to support other small businesses around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture and sell mattresses and other bedding products to customers in Dayton, Ohio, USA.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: I am able to do something for others

lenders.name: Michael Palmer
lenders.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit and I know that if there's a will there's a way.  Providing small loans to these entrepreneurs around the world gives me the opportunity to make a difference by fuelling their will to succeed.  I'm inspired by these entrepreneurs and it increases my commitment to what I'm doing in my own business in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach entrepreneurs and business owners in Canada and Australia to perform at their best.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to see their dreams and hopes come true.   Investing in the world's working poor is a wonderful investment in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computer systems that help some of the most vulnerable people in New York State.  I care about people in New York State and around the world.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping individuals who have ambition and goals to improve their circumstances and livelihood.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an art museum coordinating art loans and exhibitions that travel around the US.

lenders.name: Trond-Atle
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a away of helping that cost you almost nothing, and therefore you can help a lot. I also think this way of helping is giving more entrepreneurs better self esteem and dignity in a challenging world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm developing energy recycling technology.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I have great respect for entrepreneurs. I am one! It is lovely to be able to help folks improve their quality of life. It is a privilage.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large law firm. My husband and I also own our own business. I sell the Firms services to large banks.

lenders.name: Rick

lenders.occupational_info: Help improve education

lenders.name: Ehren
lenders.occupation: Creative maker, thinker, explorer, and writer.
lenders.loan_because: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.  —Dalai Lama

lenders.loan_because: I want others to improve their financial positions so that they may take care of their families and pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage learning at a two-year college. We focus on getting students into a career quickly so that they can pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Gretel
lenders.loan_because: I have a generous nephew who gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: Now, my work is volunteer work.  My community has a computer club and I am membership director.  I work one day a week for Citizen's Patrol in our police department.  My PEO chapter's treasurer.  PEO is an international organization which raises money to loan to women so they may achieve an education.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students who have special needs known as autism.  These students have challenges with  their learning and I work to find ways to help them understand.

lenders.name: Kersti
lenders.loan_because: ...we are all one.  I live in incredible abundance and safety.  All people on our earth deserve this right.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a photographer, I am privileged to share the beauty of nature through my photos.
As a psychotherapist, I help people make positive changes in their lives.

lenders.name: taj
lenders.occupational_info: I plant trees so the water and the air will be clean.  Birds will have a place to nest and people can enjoy nature.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the responsibility of those with extra resources to help those without, as we would want to be helped if the situation were reversed.  Everyone should be able to become self-sufficient and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school classes when their regular teacher is ill or unable to go to work.

lenders.name: DUANE & SUSAN
lenders.loan_because: Giving a helping hand to people who are willing to work hard to help themselves is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Mikayla and Heath

lenders.loan_because: Karma is a very real concept, and I like being able to see who I'm helping and how I'm helping them.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student studying to become an English teacher.

lenders.name: Kimm
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need and want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: If everyone can do a little, then a whole lot can get done!

lenders.name: Pearl
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people who receive help will help others in return.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I know success in all areas comes from hard work if given the opportunity.  Sometimes you just need a hand to help you.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a Retail Packaging Business In New York City and Long Island NY. Most products I sell like shopping bags are made of paper or plastic and store owners wrap their goods in them for customers to carry out after they buy the store goods. I am also a Real Estate agent and licensed to sell & rent houses.

lenders.name: Branden
lenders.loan_because: I think micro loans have great potential, though I'm slightly concerned about supporting a neoliberal project.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students to plan cities.

lenders.name: David & Dagmar
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is important for them and important for us.  The internet makes us all neighbors now. It's an awesome opportunity to love someone so remotely, so personally.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an average American couple. I work with computers at the US Dept. of Agriculture. She works making our house a home.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because:
I have everything I need already and my money is wasted in my savings account. 

I'm no expert in international development, but experts I love and trust tell me nothing is as effective to help people who haven't had many chances as giving them help that comes with responsibility. 

I hope my loans can help people get started, and that I get paid back so I can re-invest in even more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit website called Global Voices (http://globalvoicesonline.org) doing website programming. I'm lucky enough to work at home and choose what I do with my time.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I believe microcredit is the best way to get funds to people directly and help them fund their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a 2nd language.

lenders.name: Carmencita
lenders.occupational_info: I love to travel, do volunteer work and hang out with my husband, family and friends. I am working on simplicity: e.g.getting rid of clutter not just physical, but also mental and spiritual.

lenders.name: Meaghan
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others
lenders.occupational_info: I work with inner city youth

lenders.name: Lil, Karen and Patsy
lenders.loan_because: A little help goes a long way and it feels great to  help someone change their life!

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: To help other small business owners succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange flowers for the bride to carry in her wedding ceremony.

lenders.loan_because: I choose to give back...

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people begin to realize their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: test streams and lakes to make sure that the water is clean, and if it is not,  to devise methods for finding out why and solving the problem

lenders.occupational_info: I teach people about small and microbusiness and about using technology to communicate and to learn, usually over the Internet.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I know that small loans can help not only the recipient, but also the people around them. By helping people become self-sufficient, they in turn lift up their community.

lenders.loan_because: I like helping other! Simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: Entertainment & Lifestyle Public Relations

lenders.loan_because: I traveled a lot, visiting around 50 countries so far, and I think lending it's a good way to help people develop their activity.
lenders.occupational_info: Each country is a different story, but people have a lot in common everywhere: expectations, problems, rights.

lenders.name: Carolyn and Steve
lenders.loan_because: We care about the well being of people.

lenders.name: Dave & Rama
lenders.loan_because: all that is ours is loaned, too
lenders.occupational_info: engineers by training.  parents by grace.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: "If there is a poor man with you, one of your brothers, in any of your towns in your land which the Lord your God is giving you, you shall not harden your heart, nor close your hand from your poor brother; but you shall freely open your hand to him, and shall generously lend him sufficient for his need in whatever he lacks." ~Deut. 15:7-8
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a production assistant at a Christian marketing group. Our sole purpose is to further the cause of God's Kingdom by putting quality Christian products into the hands of people everywhere as quickly and efficiently as possible. We are the nation's largest full-service marketing group, serving nearly 600 U.S. independent retailers.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: CAPITALISM:  I believe one of the best ways to a higher standard of living are through businesses, big or small..

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: ...I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and I feel a responsibility to help other people who may not have the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform research that hopefully will lead to new and improved medical treatment.  I currently work on a project that is exploring a new treatment for brain cancer.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because:
“Those who are happiest are those who do the most for others.” 
― Booker T. Washington, Up from Slavery
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of doctors at two different hospitals.
